website_summaries.verdict: The JLab Omni is an affordable, powerful Bluetooth headphone pair aimed at bass lovers, but some annoying design quirks hold it back.
pros: Powerful audio with boosted bass response
Can be used to send Bluetooth audio to other headphones or stereo receiver connected by cable
Can be used passively, in wired mode—audio cable with inline remote and mic is included
cons: On-ear controls are a bit clunky
Can be uncomfortable over long listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries, no support answer
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked great for about 5 weeks. Then the batteries became impossible to charge. I tried different USB chargers and different cables, no luck. There are similar reports of bad batteries by other buyers. Since it was passed the 1 month Amazon return window, I emailed amazon@jlabaudio.com. One week has already passed by and still no answer. No exactly happy right now... The batteries are supposed to be Li-ion, so they should last a while. But who knows about their quality...
customer_reviews.author: Thierry T

customer_reviews.title: These are nice. This unit has been thoroughly reviewed many
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. This unit has been thoroughly reviewed many, many times here, so I'll just put my thoughts into a few bullet-points.... Very comfy. Great battery life. Sound good. Do yourself a favor, and listen to a THX demo on youtube. I could actually feel my head being hit with the low frequency sound pressure. Nice Bluetooth range, and no hiss. Quality build. Some reviews complain about the "wobbly", cheap feeling volume wheel. It's not bad, really...just some slop. Not a deal breaker. If you have a media streaming box, like FireTV, pair these up and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good. The issues I have are the cups do ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. The issues I have are the cups do not fit over the ear. This causes much discomfort in wearing them after just 2 hours. I wish I could wear them all day. The other complaint is the control dial rattles when you move. This gets quite annoying. If I had the opportunity to buy these again I would not. I also wouldn't recommend them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... OMNI Premium in my opinion is one of the best ever since I had bought my first headphones and ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say JLab Audio OMNI Premium in my opinion is one of the best ever since I had bought my first headphones and kept up with JLab Audio in "VIP". Like in Amazon prime Jlab Audio are easy to understand and very helpful in costumer services when communicating with costumers with disabilities and that's what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There’re Okay
customer_reviews.text: They are just okay. There is no equalizer setting like many of jlabs other products, only one fixed sound setting. Comfortable all round the head and ears. They are noise canceling. They are no where near Beats Solo 3s or Boise products. You get what you pay for. Overall, I am happy with them. I will never spend $200 or $300 on a pair of headphones. But, with all that I’ve purchased in the past 25 years, I’ve probably spent more. If you are trying to save a buck, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Hear aspects of songs you've never heard before!
customer_reviews.text: These sound great. Nice full range of sound--I heard aspects of many songs I had never heard before. Initially a little tight, but after a week or so, they hit the sweet spot. Give them a few days to stretch to your head size. Connects flawlessly every time. They fold down really nicely. Only need to be charged about once a week, and this is with nearly full-time use at work. These also do a great job of blocking out noise in the room without having to turn the music up too loud. My ears do not feel fatigued at the end of the workday like they used to with earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is bluetooth headphone, but for a short time!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good according to its price. I think that the headphone is one of the best choice at price/performance scale. However, it is like fairtale which ended bad... At the first years, its battery died and when I wrote this problem they did not care this. So, although it has bluetooth ability, it is not going to be in short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 2 years these headphones have held up extremely well! I have used them almost daily since I got them. The hinges and frame are still strong and sound quality is amazing. They have never let me down! If they were stolen or lost I would definitely buy them again. My only qaulm is that the control knob sticks occasionally but that's not unexpected after 2 years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wonderful sound Tech suport, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I had a fit tying to get them to play and all you all cold tell me send them back. I asked if the switch on the side would make a difference and was told it would have no effect send them back. I had to try. And moved the switch to its other position. POOF! FIXED! BY ME NOT TECH SUPPORT, soumd wise I vant complain. Just wonderful Music has never sounded so good I can't describe. Tjatsvwjat the stars are for. 0 for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: These things are pretty great, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These things are pretty great, especially for the price. Bluetooth when I need it, Wired when I want it. I'm not an audiophile so I can't say much beyond they sound great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: While looking great, I didn't like the touch and feel of ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. While looking great, I didn't like the touch and feel of the ear pads, my ears would sweat in them :) I also found that the sound it makes when connected to Bluetooth but not playing anything is pretty loud, I couldn't bear it. Also, it can not connect to several devices at a time, so I returned them and bought a slightly more expensive ones meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: OlegTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a flash deal as as gift. They work very well, just as described. They fold up better than beats and they play very loudly. U can actually have them off the ear and turn the speakers outward and it plays like a mini speaker. It is very well built, not flimsy. It took a while to be delivered though. It's been almost a year and it works like new. Very comfortable and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheka

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair
customer_reviews.text: My favorite headphones ever. I had a pair from another company a lot more expensive, so when those broke I was so happy to find these. Much cheaper but same great quality. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N.

customer_reviews.title: great sound, great comfort, great price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the real deal. Easy to re-charge, easy to use, fits comfortably and best of all, completely wireless. I used these headphones to listen to music and several lengthy podcasts. The headphones are comfortable for listening to several hours at a time. The re-charge time is typically about an hour, and the listening time is about 8 hours at standard volumes. The sound is excellent for all types of music and podcasts. If you want quality bluetooth wireless headphone at an affordable price, look no further. Highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ian says

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not great. Use it for music, not for calls.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED (May 1, 2016) Pretty good quality of materials, sound is really good for Bluetooth headset. I was able to verify it uses advanced aptX codec - which is not always found in some more expensive BT headsets. Usually connects fast, but sometimes need to go back to Settings to reconnect (Samsung Note tablet). Built-in microphone is not good for Skype or other calls. Verified that using the small mike in the cable connected to computer provides passable quality, not great. SO mostly using for listening music. Battery lasts for hours. Mostly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel H

customer_reviews.title: but they are useless to me now
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these 5 stars for their performance and sound proportionally to the price, however, prior to 12 months of mild to moderate use, they stopped working. They are connected, they charge, but no sound comes out. Even when wired in. Makes no sense, but they are useless to me now. They were very nice while they worked, hence the two stars.
customer_reviews.author: JC Williams

customer_reviews.title: Years later...
customer_reviews.text: And these are still going strong. I absolutely love these headphones. Ear foams started to fall apart after many many uses, but Jlab sent me new ones for free. I don't understand other reviewers complaints with quality, or customer service. I have purchased these multiple times as gifts because friends and family members loved them so much too.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BF loves these! Bought these as a Christmas gift and they are great! It's nice that you can use the controls on the headphones to answer/disconnect calls. The sound quality is great - I walked to the other side of my apartment (a bedroom, kitchen and living room between) before the song started to cut out. The only complaint that I would have is that the knob that turns the song/volume jiggles a bit when jumping/running. Since it's plastic on plastic, you can hear/feel the vibrations a bit. But perhaps that wouldn't be the case if the volume was up higher? Bottom line, these are a great product and much more affordable than the higher end bluetooth headphones!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: A good value in a Bluetooth Headphone.
customer_reviews.text: A very good value. This moderately priced Bluetooth headphone works quite well. It's very easy to pair with devices and has a good battery life. The sound quality is quite good for the price. It does favor the bass end a bit, and has decent highs. While the battery life is good, I don't like the way it announces the battery needs charging. There is no warning - it just starts beeping. I have not tried the cord or the microphone for phone calls. I only use this for music.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Sommers

customer_reviews.title: I personally like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I personally like these headphones. The quality is nice. The leather is soft and there is no clamp, but because of that the headphone does tend to leak a bit if you put it higher than a volume of 50. My ears a quite small, so the seal is great for me, but the adjustment might not be suitable for those with large heads. The headphones itself is extremely comfortable. I've had it for two weeks now. I've carried for traveling as well as used it at home with my laptop. For the price the build quality and sound is good. It sounds best wired, as that's expected, but as wireless it isn't so bad either. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Portal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the reviews. So I thank the previous posters. The only thing that keeps this from being a 5 star is the weight. I was looking for something I could wear while cleaning my house. It does slip a little so you have adjust occasionally. I would not recommend this for working out because it think the ear pads could get gross after a while. The sound quality is there for the novice and since I wasn't willing to spend $100 +++, this fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Squire

customer_reviews.title: Sound + Quality + Price + Features make these my #1
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, lightweight (in comparison to others), clear crisp sound. I have a wide head (snapped the band on two competitor headphones while putting on or taking off), but these fit well, neither too tight or loose. I mostly listen to R&B, Hip-Hop, and talk. I have used these during online calls and others seem to hear me just fine. And, I love the feature allowing my others to connect their wired headphones into the line in/out jack on these. I have even once plugged my speakers into my headphones to allow them to plan music via bluetooth. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Myster Chill

customer_reviews.title: Get these and simplify your listening experience!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally cut the cord. I listen to a lot of podcasts and I'm constantly in and out of my car. Can't tell you how many times I got the cables hung up on something or my dog snagged them when she was hopping around excited to go outside. Moving around and listening to what I want everywhere I go is so much more seamless. Sound quality is great and the controls are simple and sufficent. Quick turn the knob to skip foward or backwards. Turn and hold to adjust volume. Press the button for power or to answer the phone. Doesn't get much more simple than that!
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Diluzio

customer_reviews.title: USB charging connection broke
customer_reviews.text: This is the second headphones we have ordered. The original purchase had same problem. The connection on the headphone for the charging cord breaks off and you can no longer charge the headphones. Same thing happened on the second purchase. Each lasted about a year. Purchased a different model hoping they have corrected the manufacturing issue.
customer_reviews.author: lambobuilder

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about a year now. I love everything about them! I can take a walk, meditate at home or just rock out. They are extremely comfortable and light weight. Buy them, you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: So granted I look like an air traffic controller at the gym when I wear these, but the sound quality is great, I love not being tangled up in wires, and I like tuning out the idiots around me whilst I'm lifting heavy things. Plus they're a big huge universal sign of "Don't talk to me." Serious though, the sound quality is wonderful, they're comfortable, charge quickly, easy to adjust the volume and skip through songs. These are great and I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: YogaFoodieFitness

customer_reviews.title: These have worked pretty well for me
customer_reviews.text: These have worked pretty well for me. They're fairly comfortable; the sound is decent, and the battery lasts a long time. I'd probably purchase them again. Pros: Good battery life Good build quality Aesthetically pleasing Easy to set up and use Cons: The ear cups could be bigger; they're just barely classifiable as around-the-ear. They tend to move out of adjustment very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort.  Gets confused if paired with multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Pairs easy with bluetooth enabled devices. Has hard time knowing which device you are using. Sometimes remains paired with last device used even if not using. SO have to manually reconnect to current device. Sound is ok for price and with all bluetooth has hissing in background but less so than others. Reason 4 instead of 3 stars is comfort of earpieces. Although will sweat, it is more comfortable and can can wear for hours without hurting ears. Charge life is over better than others. Have used for over 20 hours on single charge
customer_reviews.author: Doc Doc

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these head phones for nearly 6 months now and all I can day is wow! These cannot be beaten for the price. Sound quality is outstanding, build quality is outstanding, bluetooth range is outstanding, battery life is Unbelievable! I have used these at my computer all day playing games amd they didn't die. They have not died on me some I've owned them, I doesn't think that was possible. The sound quality is the best of any headphones I've owned and only beaten by one other pair I have heard (not beats, lol). Would recommend these to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and sit comfortably on/over the ear
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, a big fan of these. I picked up a pair once they went on sale, and they're very high quality. The headphones are quite plush, if that's the right word to describe them, and sit comfortably on/over the ear. The sound quality is good, although, with it being bluetooth, you are limited to a specific range. Overall, I like them a lot, and can see them coming into use for long plane-rides (providing I pre-load my phone with music).
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: best headsets I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: best headsets I have ever used, and I have used few, like Dr, Dre, Bose, and Sonny. I like that for the price, the wireless works perfectly each time, it connects super easy and once it recognizes the pairing device once, you don't have to re-pair in the future. But, the best part is the quality of the sound for the price. You won't be sorry on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a christmas gift for my nephew and work absolutely perfectly. The headphones are a great fit and the controls are all on the headphone itself. It is a little confusing at first but once you get the hang of it, they are easy to maneuver. They block out all outside sound and the bluetooth connects easily to all devices. I highly recommend this product when looking to buy wireless bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Vanna Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!  spend the remaining $150 (for Beats) on music and movies to enjoy these headphones
customer_reviews.text: no reason every buy Beats or Sol or Bose. these sound AWESOME. i have to admit, the only reason i bought them was bc my beats broke (stepped on them in my hotel room). i can't say they are tons better than my Beats Solo, but i'm 100% confident they don't sound worse. bluetooth hook up is very simple and reliable. they look great. and base thumps with Rap music or watching Dark Knight on an iPad on a plane. if you care about sound and not label. you win here at $99.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased - they sound great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these. They have a very acceptable sound. Enough bass and the treble range isn't terribly loud. I would say they are well-balanced and clear. I'm very happy with them. Plus, the bluetooth feature is awesome. No more cords. I can actually walk around the house while I'm working and not yank them off my head when the cord gets caught in whatever I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Great but battery issues
customer_reviews.text: Great until battery died. Good sound. Low cost option. Great feature to use with a headphone jack (provided) if battery needs charging. Have had for 3.5 months and battery will not charge. Reaching out to JLAB to see if they will honor the 1 year warranty. If so will bumb up the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, but definitely not on par with the best in class.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm incredibly impressed at how quick these arrived to rural Australia - less than 5 calendar days. In any case, if you can score these for under $80 as I did, they're definitely a steal. The commonly listed $100 is also solid deal as there's a lot of great value for money in these. Build quality is great. If it weren't for the cheap feeling wheel control the build quality would be excellent. It's actually jarring how cheap the plastic feels to press and manipulate. Sound quality is excellent. Very clean and well balanced. I usually listen to a set of Bose QC15s which are definitely more full and crisp, but these are still quite good.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Virly

customer_reviews.title: I like not having the cords but I only use them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3 years ago. The battery failed within the first year but Jlab replaced them under warranty. I like not having the cords but I only use them for music. I do not use them for talking on the phone. I like the sound quality and they connect easily to my phone or laptop. As long as the battery holds up I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luebker

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, long battery life and very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, long battery life and very confortable. Before I got these, I bought the Sennheiser HD 380 Pro and they were so bad that I return them. Maybe I got a bad unit, I don't know, but the sound was bad, one of the speakers did weird noises... Extremely bad experience with them. I'm not an audiophile, but I really enjoy my music, specially bassy electronic music, and this headphones sound great. The sound is very warm and clear, and it can be SO loud. With the volume set all the way to the max on the headphones, I have to leave it on the minimum on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Fun but I returned because I wanted higher quality audio. The Bluetooth occasionally disconnected and made a lot of crackling that was distracting... Especially when listening to albums through or symphonies. More of a novelty. Never used the audio out to share what I was listening to. Maybe I just don't have friends. Ears started to hurt after an hour of use. Slightly uncomfortable. But a fun headset.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Quality for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Like: - Well built - Fit well your head and provide good noise cancellation - Light enough and can be worn like 5-6 hours in a row if needed Dislike: - power cord for charging is about only 20 cm in length. JLab, was that a joke?
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just three months and then just died. Power goes on as long as the USB cord is attached, which means the battery itself cannot hold a charge. Piece of crap. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked them because I could sync with my iPhone 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this headphone after reading reviews above three stars. Liked them because I could sync with my iPhone 6 and MacBook. The unit is very good within the range specified. I use it mostly for listening podcast. They are comfortable and easily adjusted on my head. I purchase 2 more sets for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Molar

customer_reviews.title: Went thru two sets in a 9 month period. ...
customer_reviews.text: Went thru two sets in a 9 month period. First set stopped charging after 6 months, replacement set after 3. Returned the first set to JLab for "free" warranted replacement that cost me $25 in shipping. Second pair I returned to Amazon at their expense for a refund. Kudos to Amazon, but never buying JLab headphones again.
customer_reviews.author: Sports fan

customer_reviews.title: Easily pairs to bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for air travel mostly, but also works very well for pc at home. Easily pairs to bluetooth devices, controls are easy to use (one knob on the right side), comes with a nice case, folds up well, very nice for the price, excellent sound, comfortable to wear for hours. The only reason I didn't give it 4 stars was because of 2 things: 1) I'm not sure how the push button on the side will hold up, and there is no tension adjustment for earphones to stay in place. Other than that, this works well for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these headphones! They're comfortable, lightweight, and the sound quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: E Carlson

customer_reviews.title: They're alright.
customer_reviews.text: They're not amazing, but they have good bass and sound quality... I miss my Flex Bluetooth Active [They got stole]. If you can, I would recommend those over these.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bhela

customer_reviews.title: I just got these yesterday and I love the headphones themselves
customer_reviews.text: I just got these yesterday and I love the headphones themselves, they're incredibly comfortable, and from what I know of sound, they're great. The only reason they get 4 instead of 5 stars is because I feel like since they're marketed as bluetooth, the aux cord was sort of just an afterthought. From first glance, the cord seems ok, but after I plugged it in, I had to turn the cord around in the jack and fiddle around with it to make it worth in both sides of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While they sound amazing to me
customer_reviews.text: While they sound amazing to me, I can't really comment on how good the sound quality is since I have no ear for music, but my 12 y/o daughter was readily able to connect and administer these herself without any help. They have strong battery, too, from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, works properly, pairs well
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, works as it should. The button and rotating function on the headphones is a little finicky but the sound is amazing and it is very comfortable. Not quite over the ear but everything/the function of folding the headphones is also awesome
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: best headphones I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I went from Dre beats to these. Great product. Comfortable, amazing sound quality. I wore them on 12 hours of flying and I could barley hear any engine noise at all and I was in the back of the plane behind the engines. Also the controls are easy and the product connects with ease to any device. AND I love being WIRE-less!
customer_reviews.author: D. cyr

customer_reviews.title: ... them for a while kind of hurts your ears like a clamp
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 out 5 the only reason i did not give it a 5 is because i have a big head so after wearing them for a while kind of hurts your ears like a clamp. sound quality and range of bluetooth is amazing. also the fact that you can link 2 sets together is fantastic also.
customer_reviews.author: Zemog

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Comfortable for a couple hours but doesn't fully cover ears. I'll rotate them to feel better for longer wear. Mic and Bluetooth work great out of the box. Nice case and folding feature. Design is wide and a bit conspicuous when in public. Great sound for the price. Would buy again so far.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaStephen

customer_reviews.title: These are great headsets. The first ones I got are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are great headsets. The first ones I got are amazing. I actually prefer the sound over the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x even when using the Bluetooth. So I ordered a second one for my wife and it sounded a little weird. Currently exchanging them for another one. Hope they are as good as the first ones.
customer_reviews.author: W.N.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones mainly for mowing. It takes me about 2.5 hours to mow my lawn with my zero turn and I listen to music with these headphones the entire time. They work great with my ipod. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: koolaid117

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good comfort, pretty good sound, usually associates quickly but does lose the connection from time to time. I am using it with a Chromebook, and find that I need to shut everything completly down, then bring them back up to get it to connect again. Happens maybe once a day so it's a minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless Headphones Yet.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good headphones, the sound quality is great, and extremely comfortable. The volume control is a little weird, but other than that these headphones are just the best. I would suggest these for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Replaced on ear Beats. Comfortable, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Read review of these headphones on CNET and they sounded like a great buy. I'm very happy with my purchase and decided to gives my Beats to my son and use the JLab as my primary headphones. I'm less concerned with the image of having name brand Beats and prefer these as they are more comfortable in my experience (others were on ear). Good value. Not an expert but they sound good for someone who isn't necessarily an audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great home use
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a 5 if they were perfect for working out too. The sound quality is awesome and they do not leak. I can wear them to the gym, but they can get hot and sweaty. They stay on my head and are o.k for light workouts
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. John mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These work great! good sound. I'm not an audiophile though so maybe others may not agree. They connected to my laptop and cell phone without any issues at all. Charge lasts a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the sound of these headphones. I've tried different brands and these stand out. They sound great without any equalization applied, which is my preference. Bluetooth connection is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFH

customer_reviews.title: Returned TWO pairs
customer_reviews.text: First pair, the connector part was broken so couldn't plug in & charge. Got a replacement pair and those wouldn't hold a charge. Returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J. Doerfert

customer_reviews.title: Headphone looks good quality. Over-ear is not comfortable for adult
customer_reviews.text: Headphone looks good quality. Over-ear is not comfortable for adult. It's better than Beat, but Bose is still the best in comfortable level. MIC function is not perform well that it is little hard to hear your voice when you are 1-feet away from the phone. From price point of view, it is still a recommned product to buy comparing to Beat and Boss.
customer_reviews.author: Yen-Chu Huang

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but a flaw when using Bluetooth with my iPad
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. I took off two stars because the Bluetooth only works with some apps on my iPad - specifically music or movies in iTunes. to have the sound while playing games, I have to connect using the cord. I'll give it more stars if anyone can tell me how to solve this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: superb audio quality and easy to use, very nice build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef Alhajeri

customer_reviews.title: ... of "nice" (>$30 or so) headphones and I'm very happy. I'm by no means an audiophile
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of "nice" (>$30 or so) headphones and I'm very happy. I'm by no means an audiophile, but the sound suits me just fine, the bluetooth works well, and the microphone with the cord has worked very well for Skype. I've never really figured out whether there's supposed to be a mic on the headset so you can use it with the bluetooth, but I doubt it'd be well-positioned anyway. It's nice to be able to move around without cords.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. D. C.

customer_reviews.title: It's all good to stay up to 20m from the connected device ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product surprised me! The sound is really clear and the experience to pair with any device is the simplest I've ever tried. I wasn't expecting for a too long range. It's all good to stay up to 20m from the connected device and still listen to the same quality. The lasting time of the battery is another feature to take note. Sometimes I only need to charge it once per week. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, and nice range. These are a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Happy w the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy w the sound quality. Less than two weeks after getting them however, and though the use wasn't daily, the leather cover surrounding the foam on the right ear piece came apart, exposing the foam. I contacted the company who promptly sent me two new leather covered foam rounds .. with no directions for how to remove and replace. :( Still not replaced as I don't know what I'm doing so I'm open for suggestions if anyone reading this knows how to do it. Pairs well w devices, distance seems fine by me though they're mostly used in the office and therefore the farthest I walk away from my phone or tablet is about 25'.
customer_reviews.author: Irene A

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected; the battery life lasts for days, the range can reach to the other side of my house, and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, very crisp, lots of unique functions, iphone compatable, great headphones overal, my only gripe? The max volume is a little lower then i'd like
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Hands free listening.
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth function is nice to use when you are needing to do other things. Sound is also good.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Junk, had these stored for a couple months, went to use them, just played static
customer_reviews.author: billy alford

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from these, I would have expected them to cost double what they did. Bluetooth works every time, no connection problems yet. No complaints, nothing bad about them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Artim

customer_reviews.title: He says they are very comfortable. They do NOT resemble a cheap child's toy ...
customer_reviews.text: The biggest reasons for my purchase of this particular headset were the price, and the fact that the company seems to care enough to read the reviews and RESPOND with solutions. They were a purchase for my husband and he loves them. He says they are very comfortable. They do NOT resemble a cheap child's toy as stated in one other review, and block out virtually all normal to medium high ambient noise.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: This product is great if you only want to hear treble
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you only want to hear treble. Bass is non-existent. They look nice and feel comfortable but after a while just hearing the upper tones makes your ears hurt. Bluetooth and batter life are great, but the head phones are far more open than ithought they would be, which I'd not at all what I wanted for a non-studio head phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sound is Great, Bluetooth stopped working so plug them into ipod. Defeats the purpose I purchased them for.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: Headphones work great. And the wireless is the best part. Battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: So much meh
customer_reviews.text: Cuts out a lot of further than three ft from whatever in use. Button feels cheap and inconsistent when pressed from different angles. Button controls are also cheap feeling not to mention too complicated. Also WAY too easy to accidentally press the button when doing active work.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Scott Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: I love these! The sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The sound is great, and they are very comfortable, even when being used for several hours. Holds a charge really well!
customer_reviews.author: Gina R Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: For the price can't beat it, have had lots of headsets and ear buds hands down the best quality and bass I have received for the price Secondly I'd like to add they are made with great quality don't let the one with defects affect your choice!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zamaites

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang For The Buck good for music and movies
customer_reviews.text: They work incredibly well for the money it makes me want to buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will love these Bluetooth headphones. They far surpass the JBL brand. Comfortable and very well balanced sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it! Now I can watch all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it! Now I can watch all the reality shows I want without him complaining he can hear through his headset!
customer_reviews.author: HaleiwaBabyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good. The ear padding is unconfortable and the connection sometimes glitches. But it's good.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Got these for a great deal $49
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a great deal $49.99 on Black Friday. They are so good! comfortable and sound great. They seem to last a while too! the only negative is no charge level indicator. they sound so much better than my son's $300 Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Skurnik

customer_reviews.title: Loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Loved these headphones. Great price and sound quality. Easy to operate but only drawback is you can’t tracel too far from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get better headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones cushion kept coming off. No one would allow me to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Izavier Maye

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Revolutionized my workout
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Revolutionized my workout. As a dancer, I've tried earbuds for the mobility. They all fall out. These stay with me. I wish I could get them a little tighter but that's the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my nephew he's still at the age where he loses stuff and I don't mind if he loses these. And the sound is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel magnum

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: have not had them long and the battery won't charge any longer UPDATE: reached out to JLab about this issue and no one bothered to get back to me
customer_reviews.author: Al Ragone

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Though these are a little big when running, they are the best headphones I have ever had! The sound quality is phenomenal. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Huntsinger

customer_reviews.title: I like this set because the sound is good and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of noise cancelling of another brand. I like this set because the sound is good and it is wireless, not quite as good as my noise cancelling set but they are hard wired.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde L. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The "Over-Ear" part is technically a lie. It's still on ear unless you have child-sized ears.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: The Best in the competition
customer_reviews.text: I'm into audio and over the past years, I have accumulated well ove 20 headsets, including brands like Plantronics, Logitech and a host of little brands, but none of those has been as good as the Omni from JLabs. This is truly a headset that is worth the money and stands out in the crowd of the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Sati Wullabbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great headphones for the price! and they last so long before having to charge-would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Katri Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it last evening - had better sounding headphones but not as bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Kel Gress

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy to pack up in my briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to pack up in my briefcase. I especially like this product because it is very adjustable and can fit my small head.
customer_reviews.author: SLSinDC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WOW Great sound and fast charge up. We worth double the cost
customer_reviews.author: Rarewein

customer_reviews.title: Great set and bang for the $
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost every day. That says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Civdiv99

customer_reviews.title: JLAB Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of sound either when plugged into the computer or using Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

product_meta.title: JLab Audio OMNI Premium Folding Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphone with Mic & Carrying Case - Black Pearl
product_meta.description: Customer Package Type:Standard PackagingDiscover luxurious comfort and effortless control with the JLab OMNI wireless headphones. Providing incredible C3 sound and loads of clever features, the OMNI wireless headphones will become a staple for your music, video and entertainment. Rock it out! Incredible Sound:C3 (Crystal Clear Clarity) technology delivers a clean, crisp, immersive sound with vibrant highs, mids and a pumping bass through pristine high performance 40mm drivers. Pump it up! Endless Comfort: Designed with premium materials from top to bottom. Eco Leather fully embracing Cloud Foam Cushions and Plush Cross-Stitched Headband guarantees endless comfort. Relax. Enjoy. Compact : A foldable design with custom, industrial grade hinges collapse into the palm of your hand for easy storage in the included travel case. OMNI is trains, planes and automobiles friendly. Bluetooth 4.0:Free your music from cumbersome wires with the magic of Bluetooth. Stream your music from up to 30ft away or plug in with the included aux flat cable. The OMNI is ready to party with your favorite portable devices, anytime, anywhere. Universal MicGo ahead and give your Mom a call with the flat, tangle free cable and universal mic and track control. Make calls, use SIRI, it's all effortless.15 Hour Play TimeUp to 15 Hours of mind blowing sound between charges. Share your music With the simple flip of a switch convert your JLab OMNI into a Bluetooth receiver. Share your music with another headphone or plug into your car or home stereo and instantly transform them into a wireless studio with the In/Out Aux cable. Volume and Track Wheel After hours of reimagining how Bluetooth headphones should function - and we nailed it. Featuring LED lights and a brushed metal finish, the Volume and Track wheel changes the game with ease and function.
feature_bullets: Plush Cross-Stitched Cushion Foldable Headband with Eco Leather
Cloud Foam Cushion with Eco Leather Earpads
Universal Mic with Track Control and Aux Flat Tangle Free cord
Includes Universal USB to micro USB cord and Plush Travel Case

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
